about_the_game:
If you want to support the developers, get this supporter pack with extra exclusive goodies! A digital artbook showing the game's world and it's inhabbitans, the game's amazing OST, and digital map of the Underworld. All at a discount!

Artbook


A gorgeous artbook with enemy and boss designs

Map of the Underworld


A colourful hand-drawn map of the in-game world

The game's OST


58 amazing tracks, composed exclusevly for the game by Hoducoma and Maxim Grachev.

1. Hoducoma - Absolute
2. Hoducoma - Broken Circuit
3. Hoducoma - Hopeless
4. Hoducoma - Crying Angel Song
5. Hoducoma - Don't Look Back

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains graphic violence with a lot of blood but from isomethric perspective and drawn in pixel art style.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 2.1 or higher. Intel HD 3000 or better.
  • Storage: 7.25 GB available space

short_description: If you want to support the developers, get this supporter pack with extra exclusive goodies! A digital artbook showing the game's world and it's inhabbitans, the game's amazing OST, and digital map of the Underworld. All at a discount!
